posted:Posted July 17, 2021
msg:This is the only 5- star hotel in Tongzhou when I made my search at Ctrip. I came with family of 3 children, including an 8-month old baby. They were kind to give us a baby cot and extra pillows. My older kids like the bath tub. The hotel is very clean, paying good attention in sanitation. 

We had dinner buffet at the restaurant and the staff were very helpful with our kids. 
Afterwards, we went to the Kids‚Äô club - kids can have some artwork and play legos. 

Hubby had his own time at the gym. 
The breakfast was great and many choices. 
We had a fun time at the pool. 

The location is excellent - we can just walk 8 -10 minutes toward the Xihaizi park. The kids enjoy watching the fishes over the bridge. The hotel is also near Wanda mall. 

The hotel also gave us extended check out time at 2pm. 
Overall our experience in this hotel was great and it was worth the price.

msg:This time I came to Beijing for a visit, and I was very dissatisfied with my stay. First of all, the hotel does not provide free parking spaces. Guests staying in the hotel have to park in the mall, but there are many free parking spaces upstairs. I don‚Äôt know who uses them. The parking fee is 120 yuan a day, and 240 yuan for two days! Second, the hotel‚Äôs hygiene is not up to standard. There is no garbage bag in the trash can for sanitary napkins. The carpet may be spotty because it is not cleaned properly. The hotel has a clear ban on smoking, but the moment I opened the door, there was still a strong smell of smoke. Another auntie was cleaning the next morning and threw the teddy bear on the child‚Äôs bed with the dirty clothes, which made people speechless. Finally, let‚Äôs talk about the service. This is the first time I have seen that the hotel does not deliver takeout. Generally speaking, it is delivered to the lobby downstairs, and there will be someone to deliver it or a machine, but this one is to let you go down and get it, with a tough attitude. In short, from the environment to the service, it is shocking. There are still many choices for a hotel that costs more than 1,000 yuan a night, and the location is also average, for your reference.

He said that he was very satisfied with his stay at Hilton Beitou and once again praised the front desk, restaurant, concierge and security department.

Although there was no smell of disinfectant water, the water was unclear enough to lose the title of "Hilton". The breakfast section has no special features or surprises, just average. Two points that I am quite satisfied with: the bed is good and the mattress is moderately soft and hard. It can definitely bring complete relaxation and recovery to the tired body after a day of playing. There is a bathtub in the house. Taking a bath before sleeping is the best choice to relieve stress. . After driving out of the hotel, we turned two corners and found Xihaizi Park. At the end of breakfast, we specially took two extra slices of toast and croissants and took them to the park to feed the fish. The park is clean and well-planned, with few people and beautiful scenery. There are pavilions and corridors. You can stop and feed fish at Shiqiao and other places, and the children fully experienced the fun of feeding. Friends who want to travel alone and have some peace and quiet can consider staying here and strolling around.

posted:Posted November 28, 2022
msg:Advantages: The location of the hotel is easy to find, the construction industry is relatively conspicuous, the room facilities are relatively new, there is no main light source in the house, the light is soft and not dazzling, which is very good. Bathroom sanitary ware is Kohler, with high quality. The shower has a large amount of water and is very comfortable. The concierge staff were very nice and helped me with my special computer needs.
Disadvantages: The sanitation of the hotel lobby bar is not very good, there are dead flies by the bed, and no one cleans them up. Not so good. The warm air in the room is relatively strong, there are no windows that can be opened, the room is always hot, the air conditioner is turned off, it is still very hot, but the waiter has no choice but to bring a cooler, but it is still very hot and dry. The breakfast service is also worthy of criticism. When I checked in, the front desk told me that there was no buffet breakfast due to the epidemic. I could only order a set meal, which was divided into Chinese and Western styles. But how can this set meal be compared with the buffet, but it is not because there is no buffet It is really incomprehensible to lower the price of the room rate. It cannot provide buffet service, and there is also a buffet fee. Obviously, I have already booked the delivery time with the front desk for the next morning. In the evening, a male manager specially called my room to confirm the delivery time. I said at the beginning that the delivery time is 10 am, but since 10 am is The meal is closed, so the male manager asked me to advance the delivery time. I also understand the hotel, and finally set the delivery time at 9 am. I stayed up late at night to watch the World Cup game and set the alarm clock, but I waited until 9:12, and I didn't wait for breakfast. If I had known, I would not have set the alarm to get up and wait. I called the front desk, and the front desk asked me if I had booked breakfast. When I checked the breakfast content with me, it was also wrong. I didn't wake up myself, and I was released as a pigeon, so I was really angry. Breakfast was delivered at 9:30, half an hour late! You must know how important it is for a person who stays up late to sleep an extra half an hour! Staying in a hotel is to enjoy, not to suffer! In the end, it was still wrong when the food was delivered. The milk was sent as soy milk (it was the blended soy milk), and the fried egg was sent one less. , After negotiating and informing the delivery waiter of our needs again, the delivery was barely correct, but the milk was still a blended drink, not pure milk. Isn't this cost worth it? Don't forget that you are charging the price of a buffet breakfast. The fritters sent back in the morning were also cold, and had lost their crunchy taste. It was a weak taste. The noodles of the beef noodles were also a bit soaked. It didn‚Äôt taste good at all. This is the worst I‚Äôve ever eaten. breakfast, there is no one! I really can't understand how late delivery, wrong meal delivery, and bad taste can happen to me at the same time, so disappointing! ! ! Another point is that there are too few free parking spaces, and there is a fee for parking, 6 yuan/hour, capped at 100 yuan/day, and guests staying in the hotel are also charged. Can't the hotel negotiate with the company that manages the parking for free or the hotel will bear the parking fee? This varies from person to person. Anyway, the 100 yuan parking fee is a bit difficult for me to accept.

Fun Field-Afternoon Tea Set: Since dine-in is not allowed, you can only take it to the room to eat, and there is no delivery, you can only go to the lobby bar to get it yourself. The coffee is freshly made, which is very good, but those so-called snacks are a bit ridiculous Yes, 8 pieces of snacks, packed in the smallest packing box, and there is still room to spare. I don‚Äôt know whether to praise him for its exquisiteness or just say that the amount is too small, so small that it feels a bit confusing. Very worthless, very worthless! It was also in this area that dead flies were found (third photo) and no one cleaned it.
